Don't waste,
Water is Life!

You can't do anything without water in your life.
Remember the importance of saving water while you are consuming it every day. Do you know how much water you spend on your daily basis? This browser-based application was built with Vanilla Javascript and its main purpose is to help us having a better insight on the amount of water we consume in our bathroom's routine (for now, this is the only available consumption type).
Save Water, Save Life!

Thank you @webdev_matthew, @princesanjivy, @caoochner for helping with ideas and quotes for this About SaveWaterApp text.

Tiago Pereira
